review_body: These shed too much.
Response:
{'input': 'These shed too much.', 'destination': 'support', 'language': 'en', 'text': "1. Primero, asegúrate de cepillar a tu mascota con frecuencia para reducir la cantidad de pelusa que suelta.
2. Lava regularmente la cama de tu mascota para eliminar el exceso de pelaje que pueda quedar atrapado.
3. Considera cambiar la alimentación de tu mascota a una dieta más equilibrada para reducir la cantidad de pelo que suelta.
4. Consulta a un veterinario para descartar cualquier problema de salud subyacente que pueda estar causando la caída excesiva de pelo.

English Translation:
1. First, make sure to brush your pet frequently to reduce the amount of shedding.
2. Regularly wash your pet's bed to remove any excess fur that may be trapped.
3. Consider changing your pet's diet to a more balanced one to reduce the amount of shedding.
4. Consult a veterinarian to rule out any underlying health issues that may be causing excessive shedding."}

review_body: Had some problems getting it to work. The supplied cable was no good - would not charge the battery. When I replaced cable with my own was able to charge and then connect the device via bluetooth to a PC. Had trouble finding the PC software but when I emailed their support they responded within a day with the correct download info. PC program works well for testing the unit after you figure out which port to use (port 4 in my case). The accuracy and stability of the unit look very good for my application, however I was not able to connect to either an iPhone or iPad (tried several of each) via bluetooth. Will have to hard-wire if I decide to use this device in my product.

I do love these chair socks. They match the color of our dining chairs. But they don’t always stay put. I’ve found if you have a chair (or two) that is used more frequently, being pulled in and out from under the table, they weaken the material and slide off the leg. I still continue to use the socks because they are keeping my hardwood floors from scratching but I wish they would have a bit more elastic in them to stay put on the legs.
